Package com.here.android.mpa.electronic_horizon

The package electronic_horizon provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that allow your application to support electronic horizon and adasis v2 engine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdasisV2Engine.Listener
    Represents an interface for responding to ADASIS v2 messages sent by the AdasisV2Engine.
    ElectronicHorizon.Listener
    Represents an interface for responding to electronic horizon events sent by the ElectronicHorizon.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdasisV2Engine
    AdasisV2Engine uses electronic horizon to forecast a variety of ADAS compliant road geometry and relevant map data to generate ADASIS v2 messages.
    AdasisV2MessageConfiguration
    AdasisV2MessageConfiguration enables or disables generation of specific ADASIS v2 messages.
    ElectronicHorizon
    ElectronicHorizon uses the vehicle position, the ingested map topography and other related road attributes, to calculate the most probable, as well as alternative paths, structured as a PathTree of roads bundling information on form of ways, roundabouts, carriageways, as well as interchange and service roads to efficiently prepare a driver.
    Link
    Represents the smallest entity of a road segment.
    LinkInformation
    Provides basic information about a link.
    LinkRange
    Represents an enumerable for iterating through Link elements.
    MapAccessor
    Represents a class that provides information about any link.
    MetaData
    Represents common meta data of a link, which depends on the region of the link.
    PathTree
    Represents a tree like structure where each PathTree may contain multiple links, parent and children paths.
    PathTreeRange
    Represents an enumerable for iterating through PathTree elements.
    Position
    Position is created every time after electronic horizon is updated.
    SlopeDataPoint
    Represents a slope data point.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Link.Direction
    Determines which Link.Direction of the link is part of the current path.
    LinkInformation.AllowedDirection
    Determines the allowed direction for the link.
    LinkInformation.FormOfWay
    Determines the form of the way for the link.
    LinkInformation.FunctionalRoadClass
    Determines the priority of the road for the link.
    MetaData.SideOfDriving
    Defines the side of driving.
    MetaData.UnitSystem
    Defines the unit system.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataNotReadyException
    Exception is thrown when map data is not yet loaded.

Package com.here.android.mpa.electronic_horizon Description

The package electronic_horizon provides classes, interfaces, and enumerations that allow your application to support electronic horizon and adasis v2 engine.

Product:
nlp-hybrid-plus
